fullwavepy.ioapi.fw3d¶

Functions

read_pgy(fname, **kwargs)

Read Fullwave’s .pgy geometry files.

read_ttr(fname, **kwargs)

It is not as easy to implement as vtr because FortranFile package fails to read records of mixed data-types (see ttr header).

read_vtr(fname, **kwargs)

Read a .vtr file.

save_pgy(fname, dictionary[, dims])

Save Fullwave’s .pgy geometry files.

save_vtr(data, fname, **kwargs)

Save data defined on a 3D grid as a .vtr file.
